readable.title: 2830869109_c4e403eae6
readable.content: A boy and girl playing with buckets in a lawn sprinkler A girl and boy are playing with buckets of water in the garden overlooking a lake . A girl with a bucket of water is being chased by a boy with a bucket of water . A young girl and young boy are playing with pails of water with the ocean in the background . Children play in a sprinkler near a beach .
